content: A group of creditors has told Sunoco it intends to oppose the company's attempt to change the terms of the credit pact governing about $1.6 billion of bonds – a step Sunoco has said is needed to complete the sale  Bloomberg reported  citing a letter it saw.
name: Sunoco LP
title: Sunoco's $3.3 billion 7-Eleven deal faces bondholder snag: Bloomberg

content: Oct 13 Sunoco LP's bondholders are creating an stumbling block for the company's deal to sell more than 1 100 gas stations and convenience stores to 7-Eleven Inc for $3.3 billion  Bloomberg reported on Friday. (https://bloom.bg/2iaXI3U)
name: Sunoco LP
title: Sunoco's $3.3 bln 7-Eleven deal faces bondholder snag-Bloomberg

title: RPT-UPDATE 5-Sunoco to sell 1 110 U.S. stores to 7-Eleven operator for $3.3 bln

content: Sunoco LP  said on Thursday it would sell 1 110 convenience stores to Japan's Seven & i Holdings Co  for $3.3 billion as the Texas-based company shifts its focus to its fuel supply business. | Video
name: Sunoco LP
title: Sunoco to sell 1 110 U.S. stores to 7-Eleven operator for $3.3 billion

content: April 6 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1000 GMT on Thursday:
name: Sunoco LP
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: * Sunoco Lp announces strategic divestiture of convenience stores in continental United States
name: Sunoco LP
title: BRIEF-Sunoco to divest convenience stores in continental U.S.

content: * Says co's unit 7-Eleven Inc to buy partial gasoline retail business and convenience store business from US-based firm Sunoco LP  in August
name: Sunoco LP
title: BRIEF-Seven & i Holdings unit to acquire businesses from Sunoco LP for $3.31 bln

content: TOKYO  April 6 Japanese retailer Seven & i Holdings Co said on Thursday it would buy most of Sunoco LP's convenience store and gasoline retail businesses for about $3.3 billion.
name: Sunoco LP
title: Japanese retailer Seven & i to buy Sunoco assets for $3.3 bln

content: Energy Transfer Equity LP   the U.S. pipeline company that agreed to acquire Williams Companies Inc   has held talks to sell gas station and convenience store operator Sunoco LP   according to three people familiar with the matter.
name: Sunoco LP
title: Exclusive: Energy Transfer has held talks to sell Sunoco - sources

content: March 16 Energy Transfer Equity (ETE) said on Wednesday that it has no plans to sell its controlling interest in Sunoco LP even though it has received many queries from potential buyers since acquiring the gas station and convenience store operator in 2012.
name: Sunoco LP
title: Energy Transfer says controlling interest in Sunoco not for sale

content: Nov 16 Pipeline operator Energy Transfer Partners LP said it would sell its 68.42 percent stake in Sunoco LLC  which distributes motor fuel  to convenience store operator Sunoco LP for about $2.23 billion.
name: Sunoco LP
title: UPDATE 1-Energy Transfer to sell stake in Sunoco LLC to Sunoco LP

content: Nov 16 Energy Transfer Partners LP said it would sell its 68.42 percent stake in convenience store operator Sunoco LLC to Sunoco LP for about $2.23 billion.
name: Sunoco LP
title: Energy Transfer to sell stake in Sunoco LLC to Sunoco LP

content: July 15 Pipeline company Energy Transfer Partners said it would sell convenience store operator Susser Holdings for about $1.94 billion to its unit Sunoco LP .
name: Sunoco LP
title: Energy Transfer Partners sells convenience stores to Sunoco

content: July 15 Pipeline company Energy Transfer Partners said it would sell convenience store operator Susser Holdings to its unit Sunoco LP for about $1.94 billion in cash and stock.
name: Sunoco LP
title: UPDATE 1-Energy Transfer Partners sells convenience stores to Sunoco
